com.empatika.beaconstracker

Class ScannerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empatika.beaconstracker.ScannerConfiguration

  • public class ScannerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with configurations for bluetooth scanner. Default values are: FOREGROUND_SCAN_DURATION = 1000 FOREGROUND_SCAN_CYCLE_DELAY = 500 BACKGROUND_SCAN_DURATION = 10000 BACKGROUND_SCAN_CYCLE_DELAY = 2000
